channel.title: Login without updating
channel.description:
Was wondering how i can use coon's client to play on the server until bukkit for 1.5_01 comes out.
When i download the jar and run it, it still updates >_>

item.title: Login without updating
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

So i used the jar from your other topic, let it download the packages etc, then i use the jar you just provided and replaced the one in the bin folder of .minecraft but it doesnt seem to work, stays on done loading.

EDIT: nvm got it working

Read full topic

item.title: Login without updating
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

You will need a down-graded version of the minecraft.jar AFTER it updates. If your version file does not match, it will update, simple as that.

http://up.ht/ihN0yU

One way or another though, I am glad Notch has yet to fully convert the update process to HTTPS.

Read full topic
